T04D3949:293a-1: sam gra ha garbha n'a ma /
T04D3949:293a-3: snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T04D3949:293a-4: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3949:293a-5: khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho che'i //
T04D3949:293a-6: dpa' rlabs shin tu 'khrugs pa ni ;
T04D3949:293a-7: / dge dang mi dge la sogs pa'i //
T04D3949:293a-8: zag bcas las las nges par 'byung //
T04D3949:293a-9: de dag chags sdang la sogs pa'i //
T04D3949:293a-10: nyon mongs rgyu yis bskyed pa ste //
T04D3949:293a-11: de dag 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid kyang //
T04D3949:293a-13: gnyis su 'dzin pa nyid las byung //
T04D3949:293a-14: thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid ni //
T04D3949:293a-15: rtag dang khyab dang gcig pu sogs //
T04D3949:293a-16: dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon yin te //
T04D3949:293a-17: de bas skal ldan skyes bu ni //
T04D3949:293a-18: bdag gzhan grol ba don gnyer bas //
T04D3949:293a-20: rigs pa gang la goms pa yis //
T04D3949:293a-21: dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog par bya //
T04D3949:293a-22: phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun //
T04D3949:293a-23: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i //
T04D3949:293a-24: nam mkha' lta bur shes byas la //
T04D3949:293a-25: dngos 'dzin gdon gyis brlabs pa yi //
T04D3949:293a-26: 'gro kun yul du byas nas ni //
T04D3949:293a-27: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa //
T04D3949:293a-28: snying rje chen po sngon 'gro bas //
T04D3949:293b-0: bdag gzhan don kun @293b 'byung ba yi //
T04D3949:293b-1: rin chen byang chub sems bskyed bya //
T04D3949:293b-2: byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen pos //
T04D3949:293b-3: pha rol phyin drug la sogs la //
T04D3949:293b-4: mnyam gzhag langs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T04D3949:293b-5: lam snga rim gyis bgrod byas te //
T04D3949:293b-6: sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis bsal na //
T04D3949:293b-7: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa las ;
T04D3949:293b-8: /'bras bu sku gsum bsgrub par bya //
T04D3949:293b-9: sku gsum 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyang //
T04D3949:293b-10: stong nyid nam mkha' lta bu las //
T04D3949:293b-11: brtsal med thugs rje'i sprin 'byung zhing //
T04D3949:293b-12: sku gnyis bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis //
T04D3949:293b-13: khams gsum tha ma'i rgyud brlan te //
T04D3949:293b-14: byang chub snying po'i sa bon las /
T04D3949:293b-15: dge ba'i lo thog smin par 'gyur //
T04D3949:293b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ste //
T04D3949:293b-17: 'di ni snying po bsdus pa yin //
T04D3949:293b-18: tha ma'i dus su gyur pas na //
T04D3949:293b-19: tshe thung nad mang longs spyod dman //
T04D3949:293b-20: rkyen ngan bar chad mang ba yis //
T04D3949:293b-21: yun rings gnas pa'i mthu med pas //
T04D3949:293b-22: tshig rjes gcad par mi nus kyi//
T04D3949:293b-23: bshes gnyen dam pa bsten bya ste //
T04D3949:293b-24: shin tu brtson pa'i sems ldan pas //
T04D3949:293b-25: g-yang sa rab tu dran byas te //
T04D3949:293b-26: bdag gzhan grol bar bya ba'i phyir //
T04D3949:293b-27: snying po myur du bsdu ba yin //
T04D3949:293b-28: brtse bas 'di byas bsod nams kyis //
T04D3949:293b-29: skal ngan sems can thams cad kyang //
T04D3949:293b-30: byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas //
T04D3949:293b-31: snying po myur du sdud par shog / snying po bsdu ba zhes bya ba /
T04D3949:293b-32: slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
